key_issues: Market data matches Yahoo Finance real-time data with <1% variance

Competitive position analysis properly reflects transformation dynamics

Valuation range ($32-42) supported by multiple methodologies with appropriate weightings
Professional formatting and confidence score integration throughout document

verified_claims_high_confidence: Current price $23.59 matches Yahoo Finance data exactly
Market cap $10.55B verified with shares outstanding 446.8M
Cash position $4.76B confirmed via balance sheet validation
Debt-to-equity ratio 0.083 accurately calculated from financial statements
Collectibles revenue growth target $1B mentioned in earnings calls
52-week performance metrics (-30.23% return) verified with historical data
Gross margin 29.14% matches income statement calculations
Free cash flow $129.6M TTM verified from cash flow statements

Customer retention rate 65% annual not disclosed in public filings
